decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered floor plan, 13 x Unnumbered photos of all existing windows Received: 30 June 2014 Site Location Plan Received: 29 July 2014 Eurocell Profiles Specification Guide, Cavity Closer Solutions Received: 21 August 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The windows and doors hereby permitted shall only be white upvc of the type 'Unilogik62' as specified in the manufacturer's brochure titled 'Eurocell Profiles Specification Guide'.
description: Replacement of seven existing windows to side and rear of house and replacement of rear door with PVC frames
